body.p: What other compensatory effects would occur within the body during intensive exercise?

multiple_choice.choice: both increased breathing rate and decreased heart rate

feedback.p: Incorrect. Although breathing rate would increase to allow for increased oxygen in the body, there is another correct answer choice here.
Incorrect. Heart rate would increase to improve oxygen delivery to muscle tissues and other vital organs.
Incorrect. Although heart rate would increase to improve oxygen delivery to muscle tissues and other vital organs, there is another correct answer choice here.
Correct. Increased breathing rate would increase the amount of oxygen in the body, while increased heart rate would improve delivery of this oxygen to the muscle tissues and other vital organs.

hint.p: Exercise results in a greater demand for oxygen in the muscle tissues.
